text-unit.Formula:
\begin {equation*}\begin {cases*} \frac { \frac { x-1 }{ x-\sin x } }{ \sqrt { 1-x } } & $x>0$ \\ 0 & otherwise \end {cases*} \qquad \text {vs.}\qquad \begin {cases*} \frac { \frac { \xmathstrut {0.1} x-1 } { \xmathstrut {0.25} x-\sin x } } {\xmathstrut {0.4} \sqrt { 1-x } } & $x>0$ \\ 0 & otherwise \end {cases*}\end {equation*}
⎧⎨⎩x−1x−sinx√1−xx> 00 otherwisevs.⎧⎪⎨⎪⎩x−1x−sinx√1−xx> 00 otherwise
